newsitem.title: TUNISIA: SOCCER-TUNISIAN DEFENDER, 26, DIES FROM HEART ATTACK.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-TUNISIAN DEFENDER, 26, DIES FROM HEART ATTACK.

text.p: One of Tunisia's key international players, defender Hedi Ben Rekhissa, died on Saturday night after a heart attack, the Tunisian Football Federation said on Sunday.

The 26-year-old suffered the attack while playing a friendly for his team Esperance against French team l'Olympique Lyonnais. He was taken to hospital close to the stadium but died shortly afterwards.
Ben Rekhissa was in the Tunisian team for the final of the African Nations' Cup against South Africa last February.
